About Us

  • Hi, I'm Adithi and I am a sophomore at Innovation Academy. In my free time, I love read, run, and hang out with friends. I chose to take the AI pathway course because I thought that it would be interesting to learn about the usage of AI in the world around us. I think that the information I learn through these next couple years will be very helpful for me to apply as the industry of AI grows.
  • Hi, I'm Kate and I am also a sophomore at IA. I like to spend my time watching movies, shopping, and reading. I chose to take the AI pathway because I want to learn more about how AI could be applied in our world. AI is growing rapidly and I want to be a part of its expanding future.
